title: MiKRUD.com
description:
Run any business complex schema serverless on the fly.

MiKRUD is a customizable database interface system developed by Miquel Taulé at MiTSoftware.com, empowering users to create, manage, and modify database schemas effortlessly using AI tools. 

Over 40 business schemas check it out here mikrud.com and just click in Schemas Market to start a business on the fly

Here a quick demo mikrud.com/?loadschema=us-elections-2024-simulation-schema-by-mik
Demo is was auto generated
